column4: hi.. ubuntu was working fine.. now login screen not appearing.. just showing busy cursor...
i am able to login via terminal..
but login screen is not showing up. i am using ubuntu 8.10 64 bit..
try not hitting the enter key as much
no... i am not doing it..
what to do? how to debug the problem.. pls help :(
what was you doing before this happened?
i was previously working with blender..
boot into recovery mode and try the dpkg to see if there is any broken packages you have missed.
do you know which file holds the repository server information? i want to remove some of the jaunty repository in it..
how to edit that file in terminal.. what command?
